pages.text: Upgrades can be put into machines and hives to increase its functionality or improve its performance
The base of all the other upgrades.

When installed in a hive, the BaBee upgrade will give a small chance for the bees living inside the hive to breed and produce new offspring without your involvement. $(br)When installed in a $(l:blocks/catcher)catcher$(/l), only BaBees will be caught and put in cages.
When installed in a hive, the productivity upgrade will increase the number of combs a bee produces per trip. Multiple productivity upgrades can be installed.

When installed in a hive, the Speed upgrade will decrease the time a bee spends inside the hive. $(br)When installed in a $(l:blocks/centrifuge)centrifuge$(/l) or an $(l:blocks/incubator)incubator$(/l), it will increase the operation speed
When installed in a catcher, the Range upgrade will expand the area of operation by 1 block is all directions. Multiple range upgrades can be installed.
When installed in a hive, the bees will produce comb blocks instead of honeycombs.
When installed in a hive, bees that can teleport will no longer teleport when living in the hive with the upgrade.
